mapper.select: SELECT top 1 eid,t_time,t_value from zone where DAY(t_time)=#{day} AND MONTH(t_time)=#{month} AND YEAR(t_time)=#{year} and eid=#{eid} ORDER BY t_time DESC
select id, eid,t_value,t_time from zone where eid=#{eid} and t_time >= #{starttime} and t_time < #{emdtime} ORDER BY t_time
SELECT top 2 eid,t_time,t_value from zone where DAY(t_time)=#{day} AND MONTH(t_time)=#{month} AND YEAR(t_time)=#{year} and eid in(26,27) ORDER BY t_time DESC
